title: have toggle for dev mode continous test stacktrace dump to filter out non-app classes?

```
        at io.quarkus.sample.TodoResourceTest.testPatch(TodoResourceTest.java:142)
```

rest is pure "middleware" and 'x' does not do anything (seperate issue) it would be nice if we control stacktrace dump that we could toggle "show relevant" vs "show all" or similar.
